name: The Butcher’s Gang v2
description:
In a Cyberpunk world where the characters take the role of members of the Butcher’s Gang, they will challenge each other in an Arena full of different power ups to help them achieve the victory. There is also a countdown clock and the one survivor player will be selected to be part of the gang.

The butcher’s gang is a 2-Player game in a top-down scene with the shape of a labyrinth. The players control Cyberpunk characters who have their own Life Supply device. The objective is killing your enemy by eliminating his/her Life Supply device before the countdown clock ends.

How to play:

PLAYER 1:

W, A, D, S   ➤   TO MOVE UP, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT

SPACE BAR  ➤  TO SHOOT

PLAYER 2:

↑ , ←  ,  ↓  ,  →    ➤   TO MOVE UP, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT

ENTER  ➤  TO SHOOT
